recipesJson.name: Strawberry Grail
recipesJson.author: MixinDAD
recipesJson.description: A sweet vibrant strawberry ice cream flavor that doesn't require a long steep . Very very tasty after just a overnight sit or dare I say a quick warm water bath. I came up with this as a quick mix during a LONG week at work and couldn't be any happier with it......or could I hmmmm I guess it never ends. Notes to come soon.

reviews.text: I've followed yo from this recipe and EVERY one i've mixed don't disappoint. But that being said this is by far the best Strawberry and Cream I'VE ever tasted and ive mixed damn near everyone on this site and a lot from ELR. GOOD JOB and THANK YOU
